quiz.question:
Remettez les mots dans l’ordre pour traduire les phrases suivantes :
            the / we / have / house. / should / we / time, / clean / since

answers.rep: since we have time, we should clean the house.
SINCE we should, we have time clean the house.
SINCE we should, we have time the house clean.

quiz.question:
Remettez les mots dans l’ordre pour traduire les phrases suivantes :
            don’t / myself / you / want / go / by / to / come. / since / I’ll

answers.rep: I’ll want to come go by myself SINCE you don’t.
I’ll go by myself SINCE you don’t want to come.
I’ll want to come go by myself don’t you SINCE .
